00033   template <class T, class H, const char *str, class M = TempModel>
00034   class FastCalibProcessor;
00035   
00042   template <class T, class H, const char *str, class M>
00043   class FastCalibProcessor : public marlin::Processor 
00044   {
00045   public: 
00046     virtual Processor* newProcessor() 
00047     {
00048       return new FastCalibProcessor<T,H,str,M>();
00049     }
00050     
00051 
00052     /***************************************************************************************************/
00053     /*                                                                                                 */
00054     /*                                                                                                 */
00055     /*                                                                                                 */
00056     /*                                                                                                 */
00057     /***************************************************************************************************/
00058     FastCalibProcessor() : Processor(str),
00059                            _calibrationChange(this,&FastCalibProcessor<T,H,str,M>::calibrationChanged),
00060                            _ahcSroModDataChange(this, &FastCalibProcessor<T,H,str,M>::ahcSroModDataColChanged),
00061                            _ahcSroModDataCol(0)
00062     {
00063       _description = "This processor makes a calibration constant available which is stored module wise";
00064       registerProcessorParameter("InputCollectionName", "Name of the input collection",
00065                                  _inputColName, std::string("CaliceHitsLevel1"));
00066       
00067       registerProcessorParameter("OutputCollectionName", "Name of the output collection",
00068                                  _outputColName, std::string("CaliceHitsLevel2"));
00069       
00070       registerProcessorParameter("CalibrationCollectionTemplate", 
00071                                  "Template for the name of the module wise collections with the calibration constants",
00072                                  _calColName, std::string("Calibration_"));
00073       
00074       registerProcessorParameter("AHC_SRO_ModData","Name of the conditions collection for the AHC Slow r/o data.",
00075                                  _ahcSroModDataColName, std::string(COL_AHC_SRO_MOD));
00076       
00077       IntVec modulesExample;
00078       modulesExample.push_back(0);
00079       
00080       registerOptionalParameter("Module", "Add calibration for module", _modules, modulesExample, modulesExample.size());
00081       
00082       registerProcessorParameter("ZeroSuppression", 
00083                                  "apply (1) or ignore (0) calibration induced cut",
00084                                  _zeroSuppression,
00085                                  1);
00086   
00087       registerProcessorParameter("DoMipCalibration", 
00088                                  "apply (true) or ignore (false) MIP calibration",
00089                                  _doMipCalibration,
00090                                  bool(true));
00091       _tempModel = new M();
00092       _calibSet = new CalibrationSet<T>(_tempModel);
00093     };
00094     
00095     
00096     /***************************************************************************************************/
00097     /*                                                                                                 */
00098     /*                                                                                                 */
00099     /*                                                                                                 */
00100     /*                                                                                                 */
00101     /***************************************************************************************************/
00102      virtual ~FastCalibProcessor() 
00103     {
00104       delete _calibSet;
00105       delete _tempModel;
00106     };
00107   
00108   
00109     /***************************************************************************************************/
00110     /*                                                                                                 */
00111     /*                                                                                                 */
00112     /*                                                                                                 */
00113     /*                                                                                                 */
00114     /***************************************************************************************************/
00115     virtual void init() 
00116     {
00117       printParameters();
00118       std::stringstream message;
00119       bool error = false;
00120 
00121       if (parameterSet("Module")) 
00122         {
00123           unsigned index = 0 ;
00124           message << "Missing condition data: "; 
00125 
00126           while (index < _modules.size() )
00127             {       
00128               char _mod[10];
00129               sprintf(_mod,"%.2d",_modules[index++]);   
00130               std::string _module(_mod);
00131               std::string _finalCalColName = _calColName + _module;
00132               
00133               if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener (&_calibrationChange ,_finalCalColName)) 
00134                 {
00135                   message << " " << _finalCalColName;
00136                   error=true;
00137                 } 
00138               else 
00139                 {
00140                   streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "FastCalibrationProcessor: register conditions data handler for collection " << _finalCalColName << std::endl; 
00141                 }
00142             }
00143           if (error) 
00144             { 
00145               message <<  ".";
00146               throw ErrorMissingConditionsDataHandler(message.str());
00147             }
00148         }
00149 
00150       if(!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(&_ahcSroModDataChange, _ahcSroModDataColName)) 
00151         {
00152           std::stringstream message;
00153           message << "FastCalibrationProcessor::init(): no conditions data handler " << _ahcSroModDataColName;
00154           throw ErrorMissingConditionsDataHandler(message.str());
00155         }
00156 
00157       _overwrite = (_inputColName == _outputColName);
00158       if (_overwrite)
00159         std::cout << "Replacing collection " << _outputColName << std::endl;
00160       else
00161         std::cout << "Appending collection " << _outputColName << std::endl; 
00162     };
00163     
00164     /***************************************************************************************************/
00165     /*                                                                                                 */
00166     /*                                                                                                 */
00167     /*                                                                                                 */
00168     /*                                                                                                 */
00169     /***************************************************************************************************/    
00170     void calibrationChanged(lcio::LCCollection* col) 
00171     {
00172       _calibSet->fill(col);
00173       _calibSet->setTemp(_ahcSroModDataCol);
00174     };
00175 
00176 
00177     /***************************************************************************************************/
00178     /*                                                                                                 */
00179     /*                                                                                                 */
00180     /*                                                                                                 */
00181     /*                                                                                                 */
00182     /***************************************************************************************************/
00183      void ahcSroModDataColChanged(lcio::LCCollection* col) 
00184     {
00185       _ahcSroModDataCol = col;
00186       _calibSet->setTemp(_ahcSroModDataCol);
00187     };
00188     
00189 
00190     /***************************************************************************************************/
00191     /*                                                                                                 */
00192     /*                                                                                                 */
00193     /*                                                                                                 */
00194     /*                                                                                                 */
00195     /***************************************************************************************************/
00196     virtual void processEvent(LCEvent *evt) 
00197     {
00198       streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"\n\n process EVENT="<<evt->getEventNumber()<<std::endl;
00199 
00200       try 
00201         {
00202           streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"Try to get "<<_inputColName<<" collection"<<std::endl;
00203           lcio::LCCollection* inVector = evt->getCollection(_inputColName);
00204 
00205           lcio::LCCollectionVec* _outputCol = new LCCollectionVec(LCIO::RAWCALORIMETERHIT);
00206           lcio::LCFlagImpl hitFlag(_outputCol->getFlag());
00207           hitFlag.setBit(LCIO::RCHBIT_TIME);
00208           hitFlag.setBit(LCIO::CHBIT_ID1);
00209           _outputCol->setFlag(hitFlag.getFlag());
00210 
00211           streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "FastCalibrationProcessor::processEvent(), number of oldhits: " << inVector->getNumberOfElements() << std::endl;
00212           
00213           for (int i = 0; i < inVector->getNumberOfElements(); i++) 
00214             {
00215               streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "FastCalibrationProcessor::processEvent() oldHit: " << _inputColName << " ";
00216               H* oldHit = dynamic_cast<H*>(inVector->getElementAt(i));
00217 
00218               //oldHit->print(std::cout);
00219 
00220               T* aCalibration = _calibSet->getCalib(oldHit->getModuleID(), oldHit->getCellKey());         
00221               if (aCalibration) 
00222                 {
00223                   if (aCalibration->calibrationValid()) 
00224                     {
00225                       float _newValue = 0;
00226                       float _newError = 0;
00227 
00228                       if (_doMipCalibration == true)
00229                         {
00230                           _newValue = aCalibration->applyCalibration(oldHit->getEnergyValue());
00231                           _newError = aCalibration->applyCalibrationError(oldHit->getEnergyValue(), oldHit->getEnergyError());
00232                         }
00233                       else
00234                         {
00235                           streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"Do not do MIP calibration, keep old energy value"<<endl;
00236                           _newValue = oldHit->getEnergyValue();
00237                           _newError = oldHit->getEnergyError();
00238                         }
00239 
00240                       streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<" old energy: "<<oldHit->getEnergyValue()
00241                                   <<" new energy: "<<_newValue<<" MIP value: "<<aCalibration->getConstant()
00242                                   <<" moduleID="<<oldHit->getModuleID()
00243                                   <<" cellKey="<<oldHit->getCellKey()
00244                                   <<" overwrite="<<_overwrite
00245                                   <<" zeroSuppression="<<_zeroSuppression
00246                                   <<" keepEvent="<<aCalibration->keepEvent(_newValue, _newError)
00247                                   <<endl;
00248                       
00249                       if (!_overwrite) 
00250                         {
00251                           if ((_zeroSuppression != 1 ) 
00252                               || aCalibration->keepEvent(_newValue, _newError) /* Angela Lucaci: here the 0.5 MIPs cut is applied, see calice_userlib/include/MIPConstants.h*/
00253                               ) 
00254                             {
00255                               H* aHit = new H(oldHit->getModuleID(), 
00256                                               oldHit->getChip(), 
00257                                               oldHit->getChannel(), 
00258                                               _newValue, 
00259                                               _newError, 
00260                                               oldHit->getTimeStamp());
00261 
00262                               streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "FastCalibrationProcessor<T,str>, newHit module="
00263                                            <<oldHit->getModuleID()
00264                                            <<" chip="<<oldHit->getChip()
00265                                            <<" channel="<<oldHit->getChannel()
00266                                            <<" energy="<<_newValue
00267                                            <<" +- "<<_newError
00268                                            <<endl;
00269                               
00270                               //aHit->print(std::cout);
00271 
00272                               if (aHit) _outputCol->addElement(aHit); 
00273                             }
00274                         } 
00275                       else 
00276                         {
00277                           if ((_zeroSuppression != 1) || aCalibration->keepEvent(_newValue, _newError)) 
00278                             {
00279                               oldHit->setEnergyValue(_newValue);
00280                               oldHit->setEnergyError(_newError);
00281                             } 
00282                           else 
00283                             {
00284                               inVector->removeElementAt(i--);
00285                               delete oldHit;
00286                             }
00287                         }
00288                     } 
00289                   else 
00290                     {
00291                       if (_overwrite) 
00292                         { 
00293                           inVector->removeElementAt(i--); delete oldHit; 
00294                         }
00295 
00296                       streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "FastCalibrationProcessor<T,str>::processEvent(): calibration not valid" << std::endl;;
00297 
00298                     }
00299                 } 
00300               else 
00301                 {
00302                   // std::cout << "No calibration found for hit " << oldHit->getCellID() << std::endl;
00303                   if (_overwrite) 
00304                     { 
00305                       inVector->removeElementAt(i--); 
00306                       delete oldHit; 
00307                     }
00308 
00309                   streamlog_out(DEBUG)<< "FastCalibrationProcessor<T,str>::processEvent(): no calibration" << std::endl;
00310 
00311                 }
00312             } /*----------------------- end loop over i --------------------------------------------------------*/ 
00313           
00314           if (!_overwrite) evt->addCollection(_outputCol, _outputColName);
00315         }/*------------ end of try() ---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00316       catch (DataNotAvailableException &e) 
00317         {
00318           streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "FastCalibrationProcessor<T,str>::processEvent(): data not available exception" << std::endl;
00319         }       
00320     };
00321     
00322     
00323 
00324   protected:
00325     std::string _inputColName;
00326     std::string _outputColName;
00327     std::string _calColName;
00328     std::string _ahcSroModDataColName;
00329     IntVec _modules;
00330     bool _overwrite;
00331     int _zeroSuppression;
00332     bool _doMipCalibration;
00333     CalibrationSet<T>* _calibSet;
00334     M* _tempModel;
00335      
00336   private:
00337   ConditionsChangeDelegator<FastCalibProcessor<T, H, str, M> > _calibrationChange;
00338   ConditionsChangeDelegator<FastCalibProcessor<T, H, str, M> > _ahcSroModDataChange;
00339     lcio::LCCollection* _ahcSroModDataCol;
00340 
00341   };
